number_utilities module¶

Utility methods for working with numbers

utilities.number_utilities.is_number_in_range(n, low, high)¶

Identifies if a number is within a range, including the low and high values of the range.

Parameters

  • n – the number to test

  • low – the low or min value of the range

  • high – the high or max value of the range

Returns

True if the number n is between low and high, including low and high
